verses.verse: "Even <S%H1571><s%> today <S%H3117><s%> my complaint <S%H7879><s%> is rebellion; <S%H4805><s%> His hand <S%H3027><s%> is heavy <S%H3513><s%> despite <S%H5921><s%> my groaning. <S%H585><s%>
"Oh <S%H4310><s%> <S%H5414><s%> that I knew <S%H3045><s%> where I might find <S%H4672><s%> Him, That I might come <S%H935><s%> to His seat! <S%H8499><s%>
"I would present <S%H6186><s%> [my] case <S%H4941><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Him And fill <S%H4390><s%> my mouth <S%H6310><s%> with arguments. <S%H9640><s%>
"I would learn <S%H3045><s%> the words <S%H4405><s%> [which] He would answer, <S%H6030><s%> And perceive <S%H995><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> He would say <S%H559><s%> to me.
"Would He contend <S%H7378><s%> with me by the greatness <S%H7230><s%> of [His] power <S%H3581><s%>? No, <S%H3808><s%> surely <S%H389><s%> He would pay <S%H7760><s%> attention <S%H7760><s%> to me.
"There <S%H8033><s%> the upright <S%H3477><s%> would reason <S%H3198><s%> with Him; And I would be delivered <S%H6403><s%> forever <S%H5331><s%> from my Judge. <S%H8199><s%>
"Behold, <S%H2005><s%> I go <S%H1980><s%> forward <S%H6924><s%> but He is not [there,] And backward, <S%H268><s%> but I cannot <S%H3808><s%> perceive <S%H995><s%> Him;

When He acts <S%H6213><s%> on the left, <S%H8040><s%> I cannot <S%H3808><s%> behold <S%H2372><s%> [Him;] He turns <S%H9399><s%> on the right, <S%H3225><s%> I cannot <S%H3808><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> Him.
"But He knows <S%H3045><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> I take; <S%H5973><s%> [When] He has tried <S%H974><s%> me, I shall come <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> as gold. <S%H2091><s%>
"My foot <S%H7272><s%> has held <S%H270><s%> fast <S%H270><s%> to His path; <S%H9036><s%> I have kept <S%H8104><s%> His way <S%H1870><s%> and not turned <S%H5186><s%> aside. <S%H5186><s%>

"I have not departed <S%H4185><s%> from the command <S%H4687><s%> of His lips; <S%H8193><s%> I have treasured <S%H6845><s%> the words <S%H561><s%> of His mouth <S%H6310><s%> more <S%H4480><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> my necessary <S%H2706><s%> food. <S%H2706><s%>
"But He is unique <S%H259><s%> and who <S%H4310><s%> can turn <S%H7725><s%> Him? And [what] His soul <S%H5315><s%> desires, <S%H183><s%> that He does. <S%H6213><s%>
"For He performs <S%H9608><s%> what <S%H2706><s%> is appointed <S%H2706><s%> for me, And many <S%H7227><s%> such <S%H1992><s%> [decrees] are with Him.
"Therefore, <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> I would be dismayed <S%H926><s%> at His presence; <S%H6440><s%> [When] I consider, <S%H995><s%> I am terrified <S%H6342><s%> of Him.
"[It is] God <S%H410><s%> [who] has made my heart <S%H3820><s%> faint, <S%H7401><s%> And the Almighty <S%H7706><s%> [who] has dismayed <S%H926><s%> me,
But I am not silenced <S%H6789><s%> by the darkness, <S%H2822><s%> Nor <S%H3808><s%> deep gloom <S%H652><s%> [which] covers <S%H3680><s%> [me.]
